title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 77.3 - Euthanasia and disposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 77.3 - Euthanasia and disposal

State Regulations
(a) Humane methods of euthanasia shall be those designated as acceptable (approved)
by the American Veterinary Medical Association. (b) Disposal of such euthanized animals shall
be consistent with laws and regulations of the New York State Departments of

Environmental Conservation and Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
77.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
